name: All Stars - Duel
description:
In this installment, you have 5 playable characters, 3 maps, and 4 abilities.

This game is a crossover of the characters that belong to Favio Munayco Rivera and GStudios. It's a Super Smash style, but our style.

Controls:

To move in the all menus:

  • W = up
  • S = down
  • X = to select

To move in the selectors (Of maps and of characters).

  • A = left
  • D = right
  • To Select = X

To interact with the buttons use the mouse.

Player 1's Special Attacks:

  • D = Normal attacks.
    • Blue orbs
  • C = Heavy attacks.
    • Red orbs
  • B = Final attack.
    • Purple Orbs
  • V = Healing
    • Green orbs.

Player 2's Special Attacks:

  • 0 = Normal attacks.
    • Blue orbs
  • 2 = Heavy attacks.
    • Red orbs
  • 3 = Final attack.
    • Purple Orbs
  • 1 = Healing
    • Green orbs.

Player 1 moves:

  • W = jump
  • A = Left
  • D = right

Player 2 moves:

  • Up key = jump
  • Left key= Left
  • Right key = right
